metadata.Title: CVE-2022-34470 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Session history navigations may have led to a use-after-free and potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 102, Firefox ESR < 91.11, Thunderbird < 102, and Thunderbird < 91.11.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
